definition: to use one's position for personal gain (idiom)

sentences.english: Whitman was cleared of the conflict by the EPA inspector general.
sentences.chinese: 環境署監察長使惠特曼從以權謀私的指責中得以開脫。

sentences.english: I believe that he did not do it for personal gain.
sentences.chinese: 我相信他沒有以權謀私。

sentences.english: Machiavellian and manipulative , the lords are often maligned.
sentences.chinese: 權謀與操控，陰影議員常常是惡毒的。

sentences.english: The third part discloses the hypocrisy of Machiavellian culture.
This forms the hypocrisy of Machiavellian culture.
sentences.chinese: 這就形成了權謀文化的虛僞性。

definition: running of armed forces/military management/to govern armed forces/to direct troops
to follow blindly (idiom)/to take as one's only guide
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
variant of 勸誡|劝诫[quan4 jie4]
to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms
rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
to choose what is good and hold fast to it (idiom)
